resources.string:
This game is called "Bulls & Cows". At the opening, the game settles a hidden number, which you don\'t know. The goal is to guess the number with minimum amount of attempts. Each try, the game will tell the info about the number you suggested and store it. "B" is for Bulls, and it\'s number tells how much digits match the digits of the hidden number both with value and position. "C" is for Cows, and tells how much digits match the value but don\'t match the position. For examples, if the hidden number is 1234, and you\'ve tried 9243, the game would tell you that there are 1 Bull (digit 2) and two Cows (digits 4 and 3). At the top-right corner you have the "new game" button. You record is at the top-left.
Have fun!
